divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside finishing up a cigarette before heading inside to work,I looked up and seen a large black triangle with 3 lights one on each tip that did not flash nor blink. There was one red light in the center that would sort of go dim and then back on,like a dimmer switch does. There was no noise and it just glided over. I would have thought it was a stealth bomber,but after calling two near by air force bases today they confirmed there was no way it could have been a stealth,I guess they have good reason for knowing that. I'm not sure what this could have been...but I know what I seen!
Summary: Triangle shape 3 white lights on each tip and 1 red in center
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Murfreesboro
There were no other sightings in Murfreesboro on or around August 29th 2011
